name: Arnold Schwarzenegger
quote: Love stories are built around people's idiosyncrasies.

name: Keanu Reeves
quote: I am not handsome or sexy. Of course, it's not like I am hopeless.

name: Rachel McAdams
quote: If I hurt someone, if I were to accidentally poke someone's eye out, I would laugh. And then I'd say, 'I'm sorry, I really do feel bad,' but then I'm on the floor rolling.

name: Antonio Banderas
quote: I get more attention as the pussycat in Shrek the Third (2007) than I ever did as Zorro.
